ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting
ygData.msgSnippet: Do quests for exp, but if you do too much questing and not enough fighting, your skills will start to suck. Why did you pick a warrior if you do not like to
ygData.messageBody:
Do quests for exp, but if you do too much questing and not enough fighting,
your skills will start to suck. Why did you pick a warrior if you do not
like to fight? What race is your warrior?


-----Original Message-----
From: Denis A. Baldwin [SMTP:dbaldwin@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 27, 2001 12:27 PM
To: everquest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Ways to gain experience without fighting

Is there any other ways to gain experience in Queynos without
fighting? Any
place where I can train? Anything else I can do? I am a warrior,
Level 7.

Denis

Denis A. Baldwin (A+/MCP/I-Net+/Net+/CCA)
Network Administrator, CAE, Inc.
810-231-9373, ext. 229
